response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to both parties, as it is worth $800,000 to you and represents a significant investment for us. Considering its unique qualities and the potential benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product at a price of $750,000. This offer is designed to ensure a fair transaction that maximizes value for both sides. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 750000}
